scripts.predev: npm --prefix server i && npm --prefix client i
scripts.mongo:test:up: docker start budexpert-mongo-test || docker run --name budexpert-mongo-test -d -p 27017:27017 -v budexpert_mongo_test_data:/data/db mongo:7
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c green,cyan "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.dev:test: npm run mongo:test:up && npm run seed:test && concurrently -n server,client -c green,cyan "TEST_ENV=test MONGO_URI=mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/budexpert_test PORT=5001 npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.test:api:docker: npm run mongo:test:up && npm run test:api
